mean_cn: vi. 专门从事，专攻；  vt. 使专门化
mean_en: to become an expert in a particular area of work, study or business; to spend more time on one area of work, etc. than on others
sentence: We specialise in studying the characteristics of different plants.
sentence_trans: 我们专门研究不同植物的特性。
word_etyma: special特别的 + ise动词后缀 → specialise专门研究
